pages.text:
Ant Jars are items used to pick up ant queens.
Right-clicking an ant queen with an empty and jar will pick it up.
You can place it back down by right-clicking with it on a block again (if there is an ant queen inside).
You can also place it down by sneak right-clicking (see $(l:antsportation:blocks/ant_jar_block)ant jar block).

Filled ant jars can be right-clicked on ant hills to put the queen inside.
You can also click the hill with an empty jar and the queen will be put back in the jar.
